localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Make Writing a Habit. Write for at least 10 minutes a day for the next 90 days. Tweet your progress each day with the #90DaysOfProse hashtag.
blogPost.body: Make Writing a Habit. Write for at least 10 minutes a day for the next 90 days. Tweet your progress each day with the #90DaysOfProse hashtag.
blogPost.title: #90DaysOfProse - Make writing a habit
blogPost.author: Daniel K. Hunter

localize.description: 让写作成为一种习惯。在接下来的90天里，每天至少写10分钟。每天用#90DaysOfProse 标签推特你的进展。
讓寫作成爲一種習慣。在接下來的90天裏，每天至少寫10分鐘。每天用#90DaysOfProse 標籤推特你的進展。

previous.excerpt: For anyone wanting to improve their wellness and achieve their goals, the HistoricalMe app is your private, online space that makes it simple to record and track all elements of your daily life. Find out more about you with this diary app in 2021.
previous.title: HistoricalMe - Diarise, organise and realise.

localize.description: 对于任何想要改善健康和实现目标的人来说，HistoricalMe应用程序是你的私人在线空间，可以方便地记录和跟踪你日常生活的所有要素。2021年使用这款日记应用了解更多关于你的信息。
對於任何想要改善健康和實現目標的人來說，HistoricalMe應用程序是你的私人在線空間，可以方便地記錄和跟蹤你日常生活的所有要素。2021年使用這款日記應用瞭解更多關於你的信息。

next.excerpt: Elza browser is not a replacement for your web browser but a powerful tool when you would like to keep your browsing private. Elza is always on incognito with an option to turn on Tor which runs much faster than even the Tor Browser. #Minimal #Fast #Private
next.title: Elza Browser - Fast, private, and minimal web browser.

localize.description: ELZA浏览器不是您的Web浏览器的替代品，而是当您想要保持您的浏览隐私时的一个功能强大的工具。Elza总是隐姓埋名，可以选择打开Tor，它的运行速度甚至比Tor浏览器都快得多。#最小值 #快速 #私有
localize.tagline: 快速、私密且最小的Web浏览器。

localize.description: ELZA瀏覽器不是您的Web瀏覽器的替代品，而是當您想要保持您的瀏覽隱私時的一個功能強大的工具。Elza總是隱姓埋名，可以選擇打開Tor，它的運行速度甚至比Tor瀏覽器都快得多。#最小值 #快速 #私有
localize.tagline: 快速、私密且最小的Web瀏覽器。
